main event: A fast flying object was observed by two pilots of an Ethan-26 aircraft, which exploded and disappeared.
interesting points: The object was believed to be a fast moving aircraft before it exploded,The explosion occurred at a distance of 3 to 5 miles from the aircraft,The explosion was described as a white flash with a reddish white center,The object was not tracked by the radar operator during the incident,The sighting involved two pilots with significant flying hours: Capt Lowell Call (7000 hours) and Lt Clyde T. Dennis (4000 hours).
